meanings.definition: The quality of being able to withstand exposure to various weather conditions.
meanings.sent1: The weatherproofness of the tent kept us dry during the storm.
meanings.sent2: It is important to consider the weatherproofness of outdoor furniture before buying.
meanings.sent3: The weatherproofness of my umbrella saved me from getting soaked in the rain.
meanings.sent4: His jacket had such great weatherproofness that not a drop of water seeped through.
meanings.sent5: The weatherproofness of the roof ensured the house stayed cozy and dry during the storm.

meanings.definition: The ability to protect against damage or deterioration caused by weather.
meanings.sent1: The weatherproofness of the paint on the house prevented it from peeling in the sun.
meanings.sent2: Investing in weatherproofness for your car can save you from rust caused by rain.
meanings.sent3: The weatherproofness of the sunscreen shielded her skin from the harmful effects of the sun.
meanings.sent4: Her boots had excellent weatherproofness, keeping her feet warm and dry in the snow.
meanings.sent5: The weatherproofness of the sealant on the windows protected the house from drafts and leaks.
